name: strong
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Premier Pro Tapered Fit : Combines modern style with a fitted cut for a professional on-field look
Double Knit Fabric : Lightweight yet durable; made with 92% polyester/8% spandex
Double Knee Construction : Reinforced knee panels offer added protection & durability
Tunnel-Belt Loop Waist : Allows for a secure fit with any standard baseball belt
Two-Snap Fly Closure : Extended two-snap system ensures a secure & comfortable fit
Set-In Back Pockets : Functional pockets with button closures provide secure storage
Embroidered Logo : Premium Mizuno branding for a polished, professional appearance
